sentences.en: ‘Would it help if you had an assistant?’ ‘It would indeed.’
sentences.cn: “你要是有个助手，会有帮助吗？”“那是肯定的。
“有什么事发生吗？”——“当然有。”——“什么事？”

sentences.en: British Rail has indeed become more commercial over the past decade.
sentences.cn: 过去10年来，英国铁路确实变得更加商业化了。

sentences.en: Charles's letter was indeed published, albeit in a somewhat abbre-viated form.
sentences.cn: 尽管有所删节，查尔斯的信确实被刊登出来了。

sentences.en: He was unprepared to co-operate, or indeed to communicate.
sentences.cn: 他不愿意合作，甚至拒绝交流。

sentences.en: I did indeed look older and more wrinkled than ever.
sentences.cn: 我的确比从前显老，皱纹也多了。

sentences.en: I would, indeed, turn the evidence over to the police.
sentences.cn: 我当然会把证据交给警方的。

sentences.en: It is a formula that worked very well indeed.
sentences.cn: 这的确是一套很管用的方案。

sentences.en: It rapidly became apparent that rock'n'roll was a very broad church indeed.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐实际无所不包，这一点很快就显而易见了。

sentences.en: Later, he admitted that the payments had indeed been made.
sentences.cn: 后来，他承认确实付过款了。

sentences.en: Most of the essays were very good indeed.
sentences.cn: 这些文章大多数都非常好。

sentences.en: Thank you very much indeed, Doctor, I am extremely obliged to you.
sentences.cn: 大夫，太感谢您了，您真是我的大恩人。

sentences.en: The blood tests prove that Vince is indeed the father.
sentences.cn: 验血证明文斯确实是父亲。

sentences.en: The Europeans had hoped to win, and, indeed, had looked like winning.
sentences.cn: 欧洲人早就想赢了，而且他们看上去的确是一副要赢的样子。

sentences.en: The mere mention of John had touched a very raw nerve indeed.
sentences.cn: 提到约翰就真的让人心痛。

sentences.en: These cavils aside, most of the essays are very good indeed.
sentences.cn: 这些吹毛求疵的批评暂且不论，多数论文的确是很不错的。

sentences.en: Trial by television makes for very rough justice indeed.
sentences.cn: 电视庭审实际上会令审判不公。

sentences.en: We have nothing against diversity; indeed, we want more of it.
sentences.cn: 我们一点都不抵触多样化；实际上，我们需要多样性更丰富一些。

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize a statement or answer

trans.tran_cn: 真的（表示惊讶、怀疑、讽刺等）
